featured.text: 24 fresh onions, they have multiple layers of thick, dark, papery skin.
Each nest used to have but one queen, but now many mounds are often found with multiple queens.
With multiple queens at work, its population increases rapidly.
A man of multiple talents, Homer excelled equally in the arts of illustration, oil painting, and watercolor.

definition.en_def: Consisting of or involving more than one; numerous.
definition.example: She has multiple options to choose from for her vacation.
